message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000.  I think it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't pay more than $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position.  While I'm willing to come down a bit, $12,000 is still a little low for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $12,500? This would be a good deal for both of us.
